author: chay_z123
content:
Good morning -

We are in the process of spinning up a large fleet of Validators on Hoodi in the next month or so (~200), if my memory serves me correct we needed to request validator keys from some one here. Is that true? if so, could someone point me to the right person who can help with that request?

author: parithosh
content: Thats just for genesis, you can request funds to make a deposit from here: https://github.com/ethpandaops/fundingvault/

author: chay_z123
content: <@199561711278227457>  - so we should to use our own key generation mechanism to generate fresh validator keys on Hoodi? Thanks for the help on where i can get funds, that was my next question ðŸ™‚

author: parithosh
content: Yup, this tool supports generating deposits for hoodi: https://github.com/eth-educators/ethstaker-deposit-cli
